entity.name: AnkiDroid Open Source Team
entity.description:
We are a global team of volunteers maintaining the AnkiDroid application for Android. AnkiDroid is used by millions of people worldwide, studying to be doctors, studying foreign languages, studying everything imaginable. It is an incredibly high impact open source application for Android devices.

We are seeking funding to pay for contributors and maintenance of the project, with a long-term goal of being able to support two part-time maintainers

projects.name: AnkiDroid Flashcards
projects.description:
AnkiDroid is used by ~3 million people worldwide, studying to be doctors, studying foreign languages, studying everything imaginable. It is an incredibly high impact open source application for Android devices.

We are seeking funding to pay for contributors and maintenance of the project, with a long-term goal of being able to support two part-time maintainers

channels.description: You can fund us via Open Collective with your debit card, credit card or PayPal account

plans.name: Larger contribution for individuals
plans.description: Funds 1 hour of developer work per month.

plans.name: Small contribution for individuals
plans.description: Funds 30 minutes of developer work per month.

plans.name: Pay what you want: Recurring or one-time contribution
Sponsorship for Small Organizations
plans.description:
Funds 10 hours of developer work per month.

If AnkiDroid benefits your students/employees, your contribution helps us continue improving the app

plans.name: Sponsorship for Organizations
plans.description:
Funds 20 hours of developer work per month.

If AnkiDroid benefits your students/employees, your contribution helps us continue improving the app

history.description: AnkiDroid was not seeking funding in 2019
